exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: simpl. split. - intros H. apply HQ1 in H. destruct H as [w2 [Hw2 HQ1_w2]]. apply Q_spec1. exists w2. split. + apply Hw2. + apply HQ1_w2. - intros H. apply HQ2 in H. destruct H as [i2 [v2 [Hv2 [Hinstr Heq]]]]. apply Q_spec2. exists i2, v2. split. + apply Hv2. + apply Heq.
